product_name: Michelin Pro4 Endurance Foldable Bike Tire - 700 x 23 / 700 x 25
long_description: Made to last through the miles, the Michelin Pro4 Endurance foldable clincher bike tire is the go-to tire for fast-rolling performance with excellent durability and puncture protection. 110 tpi casing is backed with a bead-to-bead, high-density layer under the tread for outstanding resistance to punctures. Durable, dual-compound tread is firmer along the center for exceptional longevity, with the shoulders getting a softer compound for good cornering grip. Recommended pressure for the Michelin Pro4 Endurance foldable clincher bike tire is 87 - 116 psi (6 - 8 BAR).
short_description: Made to last through the miles, the Michelin Pro4 Endurance foldable clincher bike tire is the go-to tire for fast-rolling performance with excellent durability and puncture protection.
